title: Satans sophistrie ansuuered by our Sauiour Christ and in diuers sermons further manifested / by that worthy man Maister William Perkins ; to which is added, a comfort for the feeble minded, wherein is set downe the temptations of a Christian.
author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.
publisher: Printed by Richard Field for E.E. and are to be sold at the signe of the Swanne in Paules Church-yard,
notes: Imperfect: tightly bound and with show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
